constituent: philosophy, fold, finger, fingers, axe, mouth
koohiiStory1: A two-hour lesson of philosophy in high school. All the students, bored to death, are folding sheets of paper into planes, love notes or whatever, while the mouth of the teacher is talking about Platon, Kierkegaard and many other notorious philosophers.
koohiiStory2: I fold my mouth, therefore I am.
kunYomi: さとい、あき.らか、し.る、さば.く
